title: (x) Royal Rumble/Survivor Series - Publicity Gothic/Bookman, custom drawn {Justin}
content:
ok from the firts picture i know that royal is PL davidson americana, but the rumble text is it a commercial or custom made font?   
   
about the survivor series i need to know both fonts?   
thank u verry much for your time and effort as always i appreciate...   
jake carye   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174040im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35964.jpg)   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174040im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35965.jpg)
author: jakecarye

comments.content:
RUMBLE looks like Publicity Gothic. I've seen it called Lemiesz in freeware form.   
   
SURVIVOR looks something like Bookman.

"The WWF Thanksgiving Night Tradition" is probably [Rockwell Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rockwell-mt-2/rockwell-bold-condensed/testdrive.html?s=WWF%2BThanksgiving&p=48), but I think the "SURVIVOR SERIES" (or at the very least "SERIES") was custom drawn.
Thanks for the links, Yves -- lazy Saturday morning!
